main event: A civilian woman observed a 'space ship' hovering and slowly maneuvering on January 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as having machinery and was seen hovering for an extended period., The woman witnessed another object a week later from inside a building., The sighting was reported to involve possible exaggeration or a figment of imagination., Other witnesses in the area also reported seeing similar objects later., The object was noted to change direction and behavior during the sighting.
sighted object: a circular, luminous object with a dome on top
witness description: Mrs. Robert Hartwell and her husband
